name: Danealoria
body:
# Welcome to Danealoria
Hi! I am Amit Blonder, and here is the hub for some of my personal projects and endeavours.

## Personal Projects

### Old ASP.NET Website
This website is hosted with ASP.NET, and is the product of a computer science class in Israel. The theme of this website is diversity, and includes login, sessions, authentication and forums, and even a Flash game. All custom code was written by me. You can find the website at [old.danealor.com](old.danealor.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
